# Figure 2: speed by mass and temp treatment
```{r}
load("data/outputs/dat3_nonas.Rda")
dat3_nonas %>% ggplot(aes(x = mass, y = sline_speed_m_s, col = treatment))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  ylab("Burst speed (m/s)")+
  xlab("Mass (g)")+
  theme_minimal()+
  guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Temperature \n treatment"))
```

# Figure 3: cumulative variance partitioning
```{r}
load("data/outputs/resids_cumulative.Rda")

y_labels <- c("Overall", "Pond", "Clutch", "Individual")

resids_cumulative %>% ggplot(aes(x = resid, fill = level))+
  geom_density_ridges(aes(y = level),
                      scale = 3,
                      bandwidth = 0.006,
                      col = "white")+
  facet_wrap(~treatment)+
  scale_y_discrete(expand = expand_scale(mult = c(0.01, 0.8)))+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  #theme_minimal()+
  xlab("Residual")+
  ylab("") +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Level of \n hierarchy"))+
  scale_y_discrete(labels = y_labels)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
